document.full_text: u.s. wholesale inventories climbed in march as businesses saw a sharp increase in sales, suggesting parts of the economy are growing firmly, according to commerce department data released on tuesday.
document.title: march wholesale inventories rise, sales surge
lines_and_colors: u.s. wholesale inventories climbed in march as businesses saw a sharp increase in sales, suggesting parts of the economy are growing firmly, according to commerce department data released on tuesday.
